## Source: ossf-package-analysis (1e95f621034f0f8a7815196be16626cb63483120da948a396c70ae3d6e0f14b9)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'matplotlib-sqlalchemy' @ 16.18.4 (pypi) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:
- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.
